thread.title: Scott
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by Scott

author: Scott
title: Scott
text: This was my first experience with this company, but it was a good one. The online ordering process was easy and the order arrived in a reasonable time. Shipping charges add a bit to the cost, but in all fairness the box was rather heavy. I would use the company again.
